title: "New Spartan Forge Hunting App Uses Artificial Intelligence to Predict Deer Movement"
excerpt: "Some are gimmicks and some are fairly accurate. Spartan Forge is a new app that uses artificial intelligence to predict whitetail movement, and its founder says it was 65 percent accurate at predicting movement of wild whitetails in a collared deer study."
